Format header according to language's comment style

Source: R/language-support.R
format_header.Rd

Format header according to language's comment style

Usage

format_header(content, language)

Arguments

content

Character. Header content.

language

stamp_language object. Language for comment formatting.

Value

Character. Formatted header.
